sentence: The drama in Florida between Governor Ron DeSantis and the Walt Disney Company has taken so many unusual turns in so little time that providing a truly straightforward account of whats transpired is not easy.
author: Derek Thompson
title: Disney vs. DeSantis Is the Future of Politics
